title: Introdction to Computer Science I

title: Analytic Geometry & Calculus A
description: MATH 117 or acceptable score on the Math Placement Exam in accordance with current standards determined by the Department of Mathematical Sciences. RESTRICTIONS: Students who received credit in MATH 242 or MATH 243 are not eligible to take this course without permission.

title: Seminar in Composition
description: Required of all students. Should be taken first year on campus
